    • Method Detail

      • purchaseCoupon

        public boolean purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon,
                              long customerId)
                       throws MyCouponSystemException
        a function which receives a Coupon object and tries to buy one.
        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon that the customer wishes to buy.
        customerId - Id of the customer who will try to buy the coupon.
        Returns:
        True if the coupon was purchased.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen in any of these conditions: the coupon has expired,not enough left of the coupon

      • getAllPurchasedCoupons

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllPurchasedCoupons(long customerId)
                                                    throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which returns all of the customer coupons in a Collection.
        Parameters:
        customerId - Id of the customer whose coupons to get.
        Returns:
        A Collection of all the purchased coupons the customer has.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when received Id is null.

      • getAllPurchasedCouponsByType

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllPurchasedCouponsByType(CouponType type,
                                                                long customerId)
                                                         throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which gets a type and id and returns all of the purchased coupons of that customer with only of that type.
        Parameters:
        type - A coupon type from CouponType enum.
        customerId - Id of the customer whose coupons to get.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all the customer owned coupons of the type.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when getting customer info has failed.

      • getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice(double price,
                                                                 long customerId)
                                                          throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which returns an ArrayList of only the owned coupons up-to received price.
        Parameters:
        price - The price to filter the coupons (up-to the price)
        customerId - Id of the customer whose coupons to get.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all the coupons a customer owns with the same price.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when getting customer info has failed.

      • getAvailableCoupons

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAvailableCoupons()
        A function which returns all coupons of all companies.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all available coupons

      • getCurrentCustomer

        public Customer getCurrentCustomer(long customerId)
                            throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function to get a customer by id.
        Parameters:
        customerId - Id of the customer to get.
        Returns:
        A customer from the DB with the received Id.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the received id is null

      • login

        public long login(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws LoginException
        A function to check for login info of different customers.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientService
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the customer.
        password - Password of the customer.
        Returns:
        the customer id if the login info is correct.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Can happen when there is no customer with the same name and password in DB.
